// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Syntax :
// [Frequency] [ItemGroup1] [ItemGroup2] [ItemGroup3] ...
// 
// Itemgroup = [Item(hex)] [ZLevel(dec)] [Color(hex)] [Xmovement(dec)] [Ymovement(dec)]
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Created by StormCrow 5-15-01
//that's right this one is my baby, not that there is really much to it
//it makes an alpinelike area with mostly evergreen trees although there is the odd rocks and grass
//I decided to use the t2a rocks, the commented out ones are oldstyle uo rocks

//Modified by Ryandor 2-8-02
//I changed this script for my purposes, however I want to make them available to everyone
//The unmodified version is available at www.uocm.de/index2.htm in the Dragon - Scripts forum

//I've modified this script by creating "groups" of trees. Because of the way the scripts work,
//sometime they overlap creating even larger group of trees

// Cedar tree + needles
0096 0cd6 0003 0000 0000 0000 0cd7 0003 0000 0000 0000
// Cedar tree + needles
0096 0cd8 0003 0000 0000 0000 0cd9 0003 0000 0000 0000
// Tuscany Pine
//0003 1b7e 0003 0000 0000 0000

//Cedar tree small group
0064 0cd6 0003 0000 0000 0000 0cd7 0003 0000 0000 0000 0cd8 0003 0000 0002 0000 0cd9 0003 0000 0002 0000 0cd6 0003 0000 0001 0002 0cd7 0003 0000 0001 0002 0cd8 0003 0000 0000 0002 0cd9 0003 0000 0000 0002 0cd6 0003 0000 0001 0003 0cd7 0003 0000 0001 0003 0cd8 0003 0000 0003 0003 0cd9 0003 0000 0003 0003

//Cedar tree large group
0064 0cd6 0003 0000 0000 0000 0cd7 0003 0000 0000 0000 0cd8 0003 0000 0003 0000 0cd9 0003 0000 0003 0000 0cd8 0003 0000 0001 0001 0cd9 0003 0000 0001 0001 0cd6 0003 0000 0002 0001 0cd7 0003 0000 0002 0001 0cd6 0003 0000 0003 0002 0cd7 0003 0000 0003 0002 0cd8 0003 0000 0004 0002 0cd9 0003 0000 0004 0002 0cd8 0003 0000 0000 0003 0cd9 0003 0000 0000 0003 0cd6 0003 0000 0001 0003 0cd7 0003 0000 0001 0003 0cd8 0003 0000 0002 0004 0cd9 0003 0000 0002 0004 0cd6 0003 0000 0003 0004 0cd7 0003 0000 0003 0004 

//tree stump
//0001 0e59 0000 0000 0000 0000
